{"step_by_step_thinking": "According to the relevant documents, the recommended treatment for an avulsed tooth within 20 minutes is to rinse the tooth with saline and reimplant it. Scrubbing the tooth is not advised as it may damage the root surface. Sterilizing the tooth is not necessary and may not be practical in a dental office setting. Performing root canal treatment (RCT) before reimplantation is not recommended within the first 20 minutes. Therefore, the correct answer is B. Rinse with saline and reimplant.", "answer_choice": "B"}
